name: D I V I N I T Y  //  A F F I N I T Y

metadata.name: DIVINITY
metadata.description:
Something about you.  
Something about this place.  
Some divine presence that graces these ridges, these monumental bodies of rock and ice. 
Some spirit that draws me in at every glance, with every soft dusting of snow that dances off the Tantalus range. 

Soundtrack: "Divinity - ODESZA Remix" by Porter Robinson ft. Amy Millan

Artist: Alex Mackenzie  
Location: Sea-to-Sky Corridor, British Columbia, Canada
